metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4177 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The collect_mounts function in fs/namespace.c in the Linux kernel before4.0.5 does not properly consider that it may execute after a path has beenunmounted, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (systemcrash) by leveraging user-namespace root access for an MNT_DETACH umount2system call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4177` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
